whyRefer.title: Why Refer to Us?
whyRefer.subtitle: We make it easy for you to earn

payment.question: When do I get paid?
payment.answer: You receive your commission within 3 days after the client pays for their project. We're flexible with payment methods - bank transfer, PayPal, or Bizum.

referral.question: What counts as a referral?
referral.answer: Any business owner you connect with us who ends up hiring us for a website project. We'll track it and let you know when it's confirmed.

tracking.question: How do you track referrals?
tracking.answer: We'll give you a unique referral code or ask clients to mention your name when they contact us. We keep detailed records of all referrals.

friends.question: Can I refer friends or family?
friends.answer: Absolutely! Anyone who needs a website - friends, family, business contacts, or even people who know people who need websites.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our web development services

pricing.question: What's included in the pricing?
pricing.answer: All prices include design, development, basic SEO setup, and 30 days of free support. Hosting and domain are separate costs (we'll help you set these up).

timeline.question: How long does it take to build a website?
timeline.answer: Simple websites: 3-5 days. Shopify shops: 5-7 days. Custom projects: 1-2 weeks. We're the fastest in the industry - no months of delays.

revisions.question: How many revisions are included?
revisions.answer: Simple websites: 2 rounds. Shopify shops: 3 rounds. Custom projects: Unlimited revisions. We want you 100% satisfied.

hosting.question: Do you provide hosting?
hosting.answer: For simple websites with normal traffic, I provide free hosting for the first year. For Shopify shops, hosting is included in Shopify's monthly plan. For high-traffic sites, I can recommend reliable hosting providers.

maintenance.question: What about ongoing maintenance?
maintenance.answer: We provide 30 days of free support after launch. Ongoing maintenance packages are available for long-term support and updates.

payment.question: What are the payment terms?
payment.answer: 50% upfront to start the project, 50% upon completion. For larger projects, we can discuss milestone-based payments.

domain.question: Do you help with domain setup?
domain.answer: Yes, we can help you purchase and configure your domain name, or work with your existing domain.

seo.question: Is SEO included?
seo.answer: Basic SEO setup is included in all packages. Advanced SEO strategies and ongoing optimization can be added as an additional service.

competitors.question: Why not use a cheaper freelancer?
competitors.answer: Most freelancers aren't actually cheaper, and the few that are usually don't offer the same quality, guarantees, and ongoing support that I provide. If you find someone with better prices and better service, let me know and I might adjust my pricing to match or beat their offer.
